snippet: Speaking directly about the topic for the first time since gambling-related messages tied to his account appeared on Twitter last week, Cosart said Wednesday, “I never have, never will bet on baseball.”
abstract: Miami Marlins pitcher Jarred Cosart denies that he ever bet on baseball; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Speaking directly about the topic for the first time since gambling-related messages tied to his account appeared on Twitter last week, Cosart said Wednesday, “I never have, never will bet on baseball.”

headline.main: Marlins Pitcher Jarred Cosart Rejects Gambling Speculation
